input.sentences: my brother and his band got together to show me some of their new music .
my brother plays a really good bass guitar .
his friend adds great beat with his drumming abilities .
the sound system they have is very good and adds tons to the music .
crate is the brand of electronics they use for their music .
output.sentences: Jeremy and his brother played music with the band.
Jeremy's brother plays the guitar really well.
Jeremy's friend was drumming up a beat!
